alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 06 at 7:28AM PST until November 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of up to 18 inches. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades and Northern Oregon Cascades. This includes Highway 26 through Government Camp and Highway 20 through Tombstone and Santiam Passes. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Periods of heavy snow will make travel very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels of 2500 to 3000 feet today will lower to around 2000 feet this evening. Heaviest snow accumulations will likely occur above 3500 feet in elevation.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when travelling. Practice your winter safety rules. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your car in case of emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
